markers.title: Weston II Heritage Conservation District Study
markers.description: The Weston II Heritage Conservation District Study area is a residential neighbourhood with a collection of houses in a variety of architectural styles built from the mid-19th through the early 20th centuries located in the former Town of West.

markers.title: West Queen West & Parkdale Main Street HCD Plans
markers.description: Evaluating this neighbourhood to determine if designation as a heritage conservation district is warranted, and provide recommendations for any other heritage conservation measures.

markers.title: Woodside Square Planning Review
markers.description: The planning review will evaluate the appropriateness of permitting additional land uses on the site. The planning review will also establish the policy framework to guide any future redevelopment on the site.

markers.title: Yonge Street North Planning Study
markers.description: A vision for the future of the Yonge Street corridor between Finch Avenue and Steeles Avenue in response to existing and anticipated development pressures in the area.

markers.title: University of Toronto St. George Campus Secondary Plan
markers.description: Official Plan Amendment application to establish a new University of Toronto St. George Campus Secondary Plan that would replace the existing University of Toronto Secondary Plan.

markers.title: Yorkdale Shopping Centre Block Master Plan
markers.description: A development application that involves three conceptual block master plan options for Yorkdale Shopping Centre that include a range of retail, office, hotel and residential uses and an internal private street network to be phased-in over 20+ years.
